resources.string: ChatGPT is an AI language model developed by OpenAI. It excels in natural conversation, writing, and problem-solving across various domains.
Google Gemini is a next-generation AI model from Google, designed to handle multiple types of information including text, code, audio, and images.
Claude is an AI assistant created by Anthropic, known for its thoughtful responses and strong capabilities in analysis and writing.
Tongyi is Alibaba\'s advanced language model, combining Chinese and English capabilities with deep cultural understanding.
TigerLLM is a fictional Bangladeshi LLM showcasing the potential of AI development in South Asia.
